introduction.p: This control template is for <ListView/> and <BindableListView/> and <BindableDataGrid/>.

prop.name: ColumnHeaderTemplate
prop.p: The assigned control template instance must be or derived from <ListViewColumnHeaderTemplate/>.
This property must be assigned in the constructor of the control template, and should not be changed during the life cycle.
This property defines the control templates for all column header buttons. It is used when the View of the list control is set to Detail.

prop.name: PrimaryTextColor
prop.p: This property defines the default color for the primary item text. Primary item text is the text of a list view item.
For data grid control, the value will be copied to the PrimaryTextColor property of <GridVisualizerTemplate/> and <GridEditorTemplate/>.

prop.name: SecondaryTextColor
prop.p: This property defines the default color for the non-primary item text. Non-primary item text are sub items of a list view item.
For data grid control, the value will be copied to the SecondaryTextColor property of <GridVisualizerTemplate/> and <GridEditorTemplate/>.

prop.name: ItemSeparatorColor
prop.p: This property defines the default color for all item separators.
For data grid control, the value will be copied to the ItemSeparatorColor property of <GridVisualizerTemplate/> and <GridEditorTemplate/>.
